name: Magnet Run 3D
description:
Magnet Run 3D is a tech demo I developed to exercise and practice the 3Cs of game design/development. In this demo you play as a ball that rolls around various objects that have complex gravity sources.

https://github.com/realtradam/Magnet-Run-3D

Controls:

WASD - Movement Space - Jump Q/E - Rotate camera horizontally(disables auto rotation for a short time) Z/X - Rotate camera vertically(disables auto rotation for a short time)
